description: The organization has a defined governance structure with clear roles and responsibilities.

subStandards.description: A governing body is established with clear authority and responsibility for the organization.
The governing body defines the mission, vision, and strategic objectives of the organization.
The governing body provides oversight of the organization performance and quality improvements.
Clear organizational structure and reporting lines are documented.
The organization ensures ethical and transparent governance practices.

description: The organization establishes policies and procedures for quality management.

subStandards.description: A quality policy is established and communicated to all staff.
Quality objectives are measurable and regularly reviewed.
Staff are trained on quality policies and their role in quality improvement.
A system for monitoring policy compliance is implemented.
